article.title: Privacy Policy
article.author: Infinitbility
article.excerpt: t Infinitbility, accessible from https://infinitbility.com/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Infinitbility and how we use it.

authors.bio: Infinitbility is a tech blog created with the sole purpose of explaining complex tech in a simple and concise way thus creating value for budding developers out there.
